info.name: Lyric Health API
info.description:
This is a Postman Collection for the Lyric Health API endpoints.

The documentation is divided into **role-related** sections.

**Member Section:** endpoints that require a member to authenticate

**Single Sign-On Section:** endpoints that require an SSO Admin to authenticate

**Census Admin Section:** endpoints that require a Census Admin to authenticate

---

## Authorization

The Lyric Health platform implements JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for API authorization.

**How it works:**

1. Make an api call to /login using the users email and password
2. Upon successful login, you will receive a response like {"success":true}
3. The response will be accompanied by an HTTP Header named "Authorization"
4. The Authorization Header will contain the JWT in the form "Bearer XXXX.XXXX.XXXX"
5. You may securely store the header information on your end to re-use for each request
    

- Without that header, the member will receive authorization errors

- You may securely store the header information on your end to re-use for each request

- The tokens will expire after 24 hours of non-use

- If the token expires you will receive this response: {"success":false,"message":"Token Expired","type":"mt:authorization"}

- If the token is expired you will need to make another call to /api/login to get a new token

item.name: Member
Consultation
New Consultation Workflow - Urgent Care

request.description:
Retrieve a list of eligible members for this type of consult.

Additionally, a list of ineligible members is also returned for clarity. This will include adult dependents that are required by law to manage their own care.

Returns the member's Medical and Personal records.

This information should be presented to the member for review when building next steps. (i.e Medications, Medication Allergies, Preferred Pharmacy)
Create a local **Consultation Payload** object with the following model. You'll be populating this payload object with each step and submitting it with the last step

item.name: Add Reason For Visit to Payload

request.description:
Your member experience should collect the reason for this visit (i.e what's wrong with the patient)
### Data collected:
- Free text
- Max 5000 characters 
- no HTML tags allowed

Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.reason_for_visit`

#### OPTIONAL

Your member experience may collect the Chief Complaint for this visit (i.e their main symptom/problem).

The member needs to select from the list of possible options provided in Step 2: `available_problems.chief_complaints`

### Life-threatening Conditions

If member selects an option that has `isWarning` flag set to `1` the following warning alert needs to be displayed:

- MESSAGE: You have selected a symptom that is sometimes associated with a life-threatening condition. This service is not for emergencies. If you believe this is an emergency please dial 911 right away.
- ACTION BUTTON: I understand
    

### Data Collected

- problem_id - INT
    

Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.problems.chief_complaint_id`

#### OPTIONAL

Your member experience may collect one or more additional problems(symptoms) for this visit. 

Member selects from the lists provided in Step 2: `available_problems.common_problems` and `available_problems.uncommon_problems`

### Life-threatening Conditions
If member selects an option that has `isWarning` flag set to `1` the following warning alert needs to be displayed: 
- MESSAGE: You have selected a symptom that is sometimes associated with a life-threatening condition. This service is not for emergencies. If you believe this is an emergency please dial 911 right away.
- ACTION BUTTON: I understand

### Data Collected
- problem_id - INT | one or more

Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.problems.other_problems` array

item.name: Add Prescription Refill Request to Payload

request.description:
#### OPTIONAL

Your member experience may collect a Prescription Refill Request for this visit 

### Data collected:
- prescription_details - Free text | Max 500 characters | no HTML tags allowed
- is_needed - true

Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.reason_for_visit`

Your member experience should collect the State where the patient will be at the time of consult. Member selects from the list provided in Step 2: `consultation.available_states` ### Data collected: - state_id - INT Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.state`

Your member experience should collect the Appointment Date/Time for this consult, or default to "now" for consults within 2 hours. #### Member should be able to select: - "now" for consultations within 2 hours or - a date and time in the future formatted YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS - a timezone name (valid IANA Zone Name) for that date and time. Use member's default timezone from Step 2 - `patient.profile.address.timezone` or use `Timezones - Get Timezones` request under Member collection, using the 'name' value of the results. ### Data collected: - when_scheduled - "now" or a date/time formatted YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS - consult_time_zone - STRING | not required if when_scheduled = "now" Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.appointment_details.when_scheduled` and optionally `payload.appointment_details.consult_time_zone`

item.name: Add Appointment Preferred Language to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should collect the Preferred Language for this consult, or default to "en" for English. #### Member should be able to select: - "en" for English - "es" for Spanish ### Data collected: - preferred_language - STRING | "en" or "es" Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.appointment_details.preferred_language`

item.name: Add Appointment Preferred Phone Number to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should collect a valid Phone Number for both video and phone consultations. ### Disclaimer Required > By continuing, you authorize Lyric Health and its authorized representatives to contact you at the above phone number via phone, video, text or voicemail for the purposes of providing treatment, scheduling appointments, discussing my private health information, and conducting evaluations. ### Data collected: - patientPhone - STRING | valid US phone number | 10 digits only, no special characters Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patientPhone`

Your member experience should collect Vitals and other Anthropometric Measurements for this consult ### Data collected: - heightFeet - INT | "feet" part of member's height - heightInches - INT | "inches" part of member's height - weight - INT | lbs Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.personal`

Your member experience should review current Medications retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medications** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medications` (Do not remove the userMedication_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medications using the **Medication Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Use 'value' from search result - frequency - STRING | Max 50 Chars | Provided by your member experience - comment - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - isCurrentlyUsing - BOOLEAN | true or false | Provided by your member experience - foreignId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - ndc - STRING | Use 'NDC' from search result - medicationId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - lexiGenDrugID - STRING | Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result - lexiDrugSynId - STRING | Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medications` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medications.push( { name: STRING, // Use 'value' from search result frequency: STRING, // Max 50 Chars - Provided by your member experience comment: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience isCurrentlyUsing: BOOLEAN, // true or false - Provided by your member experience foreignId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result ndc: STRING, // Use 'NDC' from search result medicationId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result lexiGenDrugID: STRING, // Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result lexiDrugSynId: STRING, // Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Medication Allergies to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Medication Allergies retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.allergies** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.allergies` (Do not remove the userMedicationAllergy_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medication Allergies using the **Medication Allergy Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - foreign_id - INT | Use 'medicationAllergyForeignId' from search result - description - STRING | Use 'medicationAllergyName' from search result - damConceptId - INT | Use 'damConceptId' from search result - damConceptIdType - STRING | Use 'damConceptIdType' from search result - codeType - STRING | Use 'codeType' from search result - code - INT | Use 'code' from search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.allergies` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.allergies.push( { foreign_id: INT, // Use 'medicationAllergyForeignId' from search result description: STRING, // Use 'medicationAllergyName' from search result damConceptId: INT, // Use 'damConceptId' from search result damConceptIdType: STRING, // Use 'damConceptIdType' from search result codeType: STRING, // Use 'codeType' from search result code: INT // Use 'code' from search result } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Medical Conditions to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Medical Conditions retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medical_conditions** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions` (Do not remove the userMedicalCondition_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medical Conditions in free text. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Max 200 Chars | Provided by your member experience - description - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - status - INT | 0 or 1 | 1 = Currently Has, 0 = Had in the past Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions.push( { name: STRING, // Max 200 Chars - Provided by your member experience description: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience status: INT, // (0 or 1) | 1 = Currently Has, 0 = Had in the past } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Surgical History to Payload

request.description:
#### OPTIONAL

Your member experience may review current Surgical History retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.surgical_history** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history` (Do not remove the userSurgicalHistory_id key/value pair) 

Your member experience may collect any additional Surgical History records in free text.

### Data collected:
 - name - STRING | Max 200 Chars | Provided by your member experience
 - description - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience
 - procedureDate - STRING | Date format YYYY-MM-DD | Provided by your member experience


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history` with the following object model:
  
``` json
payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history.push( 
    {
        name: STRING, - Max 200 Chars - Provided by your member experience
        description: STRING, - Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience
        procedureDate: STRING, - Date with format YYYY-MM-DD
    }
)

 ```

formdata.description: Accepted Types: gif,jpeg,jpg,pjpeg,png,pdf

request.description:
#### OPTIONAL

Your member experience may collect one or more Attachments(images, documents) that the member would like to share with the physician. 

First the attachments need to be uploaded to the member's EMR using the **Add Attachments** endpoint defined here. The resulting **attachment_id** will be added to the to **Consultation Payload** attachments array.

### Data collected:
 - attachment_id - INT | use 'attachment_id' from Add Attachment result


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.attachments` with the following notation:
    

``` json
payload.patient.ehr.attachments.push( [ 1001, 1002, 1003 ] )

 ```

item.name: Review & Add Preferred Pharmacy to Payload

query.description: Matches all entries that have CVS and 75070 in their name and address
OPTIONAL - Search within 10 mi radius of a zipcode

request.description: Your member experience should review current Preferred Pharmacy retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.patient.pharmacy** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.sureScriptPharmacy_id` Your member experience may collect a different Pharmacy using the **Pharmacy Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - sureScriptPharmacy_id - INT | use 'sureScriptPharmacy_id' from Pharmacy Search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.sureScriptPharmacy_id`

#### REQUIRED IF `Step 2 - consultation.fee_details.fee` > 0

Your member experience may collect a form of Payment using our Payment Processor's integration. Required if **Step 2 - consultation.fee_details.fee** > 0 

We use **Paypal Braintree** for payment processing. Please see [Braintree Development Docs](https://developer.paypal.com/braintree/docs/start/overview) for your specific implementation. 

### Data collected:
 - fee - DECIMAL | use 'fee' from **Step 2 - consultation.fee_details.fee** | changing fee will result in error. We require this seemingly redundant parameter for confirmation and compliance.
 - nonce - STRING | Payment nonce resulted from your Braintree integration


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.payment`

item.name: Step 4 - Informed Consent, Terms, Privacy, Survey

request.description: ## Legal Your member experience should require the member to agree to Lyric Health's: - [Informed Consent](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extInformedConsent) - [Terms of Use](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extTermsOfUse) - [HIPAA Privacy Policy and Practices](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extPrivacyPolicy) **Whitelabel** clients should replace `https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric` with their own URL and SITE CODE provided by Lyric Health (e.g. `https://portal.mywhitelabel.com/sitecode`) --- ## Survey Your member experience may collect a one-question survey answer for ROI purposes: > What would you have done if you didn't have this service? Options: - TEXT: "Visit Primary Care Physician" | VALUE: PCP - TEXT: "Go to Urgent Care" | VALUE: "Urgent Care" - TEXT: "Go to Emergency Room" | VALUE: "Emergency Room" - TEXT: "Nothing" | VALUE: "Nothing" ### Data collected: - roi - STRING | one of the following: "PCP","Urgent Care","Emergency Room","Nothing" Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.roi`

item.description:
Step-by-step implementation example of the Urgent Care workflow:

- Step 1 - Get Eligible Members
- Step 2 - Start Consultation For Member
- Step 3 - Create a **Consultation Payload** object locally and populate it with various appointment details from your member experience: **Reason for Visit, Scheduling details, Medical Records, Pharmacy, Payment**
- Step 4 - Display appropriate consents and agreements
- Step 5 - Submit **Consultation Payload**

item.name: Add Provider and Appointment Date/Time to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should collect a Provider and a Date/Time for scheduling purposes. Available Providers and Time Slots can be retrieved from the **Provider Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - provider_id - INT | use 'available_providers.user_id' from Provider Search results - time_slot_id - INT | use 'available_providers.available_time_slots.providerschedule_id' from Provider Search results - consult_time_zone - STRING | valid IANA Zone Name | Use member's default timezone from Step 2 - `patient.profile.address.timezone`; or get timezone from their locale; or use `Timezones - Get Timezones` request under Member collection, using the 'name' value of the results. Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.appointment_details`

item.name: Add Appointment Preferred Phone Number to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should collect a valid Phone Number for both video and phone consultations. ### Disclaimer Required > By continuing, you authorize Lyric Health and its authorized representatives to contact you at the above phone number via phone, video, text or voicemail for the purposes of providing treatment, scheduling appointments, discussing my private health information, and conducting evaluations. ### Data collected: - patientPhone - STRING | valid US phone number | 10 digits only, no special characters Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patientPhone`

Your member experience should collect Vitals and other Anthropometric Measurements for this consult. **Height and Weight are required, everything else is optional.** ### Data collected: - heightFeet - INT | "feet" part of member's height - heightInches - INT | "inches" part of member's height - weight - INT | lbs - bloodPressureSystolic - INT | Blood Pressure Systolic reading (OPTIONAL) - bloodPressureDiastolic - INT | Blood Pressure Diastolic reading (OPTIONAL) - temperature - DECIMAL| Body temperature in Fahrenheit (OPTIONAL) - heartRate - INT | Beats Per Minute reading (OPTIONAL) - respiratoryRate - INT | Breaths Per Minute reading (OPTIONAL) - oxygenSaturation - INT | SpO2 Percentage reading (OPTIONAL) - bmi - DECIMAL | Body Mass Index reading (OPTIONAL) Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.personal`

item.name: Review & Add Women's Health to Payload

request.description: ### REQUIRED FOR FEMALE Your member experience should collect Women's Health Questionnaire when the member's gender/sex at birth is female. ### Data collected: - breastfeeding - BOOLEAN | true or false - pregnant - BOOLEAN | true or false - last_menstruation_date - STRING | date format YYYY-MM-DD Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.personal`

Your member experience should review current Medications retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medications** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medications` (Do not remove the userMedication_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medications using the **Medication Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Use 'value' from search result - frequency - STRING | Max 50 Chars | Provided by your member experience - comment - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - isCurrentlyUsing - BOOLEAN | true or false | Provided by your member experience - foreignId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - ndc - STRING | Use 'NDC' from search result - medicationId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - lexiGenDrugID - STRING | Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result - lexiDrugSynId - STRING | Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medications` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medications.push( { name: STRING, // Use 'value' from search result frequency: STRING, // Max 50 Chars - Provided by your member experience comment: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience isCurrentlyUsing: BOOLEAN, // true or false - Provided by your member experience foreignId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result ndc: STRING, // Use 'NDC' from search result medicationId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result lexiGenDrugID: STRING, // Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result lexiDrugSynId: STRING, // Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Health Questionnaire to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review all Health Questionnaires retrieved from **Step 2 - consultation.available_questionnaires** and add filled questionnaires to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.questionnaires` Each question will have a `"require": BOOLEAN` key/value pair that determines whether or not it needs to be collected. ### Data collected: - question_id - INT | use 'question_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[]` - choice - INT | use 'choice_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` - lang_identifier: INT | use 'lang_identifier' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` - value - STRING | Max 5000 Chars| required if the answer/choice selected is "Other" and type is "textarea" Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: \`payload.questionnaires with the following object model: ``` json payload.questionnaires.push( questionnaire_id: INT, answers: [ { question_id: INT, // use 'question_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[]` choice: INT, // use 'choice_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` lang_identifier: INT, // use 'lang_identifier' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` value: STRING, // Max 5000 Chars - required if the answer/choice selected is "Other" and type is "textarea", otherwise this key/value pair is optional } ] ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Preferred Pharmacy to Payload

query.description: Matches all entries that have CVS and 75070 in their name and address
OPTIONAL - Search within 10 mi radius of a zipcode

request.description: Your member experience should review current Preferred Pharmacy retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.patient.pharmacy** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.sureScriptPharmacy_id` Your member experience may collect a different Pharmacy using the **Pharmacy Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - sureScriptPharmacy_id - INT | use 'sureScriptPharmacy_id' from Pharmacy Search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.sureScriptPharmacy_id`

#### REQUIRED IF `Selected Provider Fee` > 0

Your member experience may collect a form of Payment using our Payment Processor's integration. Required if the fee for that selected provider is > 0. See **Add Provider and Appointment Date/Time** step under **Scheduling**. Each provider result has a `fee` key\value pair.

We use **Paypal Braintree** for payment processing. Please see [Braintree Development Docs](https://developer.paypal.com/braintree/docs/start/overview) for your specific implementation. 

### Data collected:
 - fee - DECIMAL | use 'fee' Provider Search results | changing fee will result in error. We require this seemingly redundant parameter for confirmation and compliance.
 - nonce - STRING | Payment nonce resulted from your Braintree integration


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.payment`

## Legal Your member experience should require the member to agree to Lyric Health's: - [Informed Consent](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extInformedConsent) - [Terms of Use](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extTermsOfUse) - [HIPAA Privacy Policy and Practices](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extPrivacyPolicy) **Whitelabel** clients should replace `https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric` with their own URL and SITE CODE provided by Lyric Health (e.g. `https://portal.mywhitelabel.com/sitecode`)

- prescription_details - Free text | Max 500 characters | no HTML tags allowed
- is_needed - true

Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.reason_for_visit`

Your member experience should collect the State where the patient will be at the time of consult. Member selects from the list provided in Step 2: `consultation.available_states` ### Data collected: - state_id - INT Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.state`

item.name: Add Provider and Appointment Date/Time to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should collect a Provider and a Date/Time for scheduling purposes. Available Providers and Time Slots can be retrieved from the **Provider Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - provider_id - INT | use 'available_providers.user_id' from Provider Search results - time_slot_id - INT | use 'available_providers.available_time_slots.providerschedule_id' from Provider Search results - consult_time_zone - STRING | valid IANA Zone Name | Use member's default timezone from Step 2 - `patient.profile.address.timezone`; or get timezone from their locale; or use `Timezones - Get Timezones` request under Member collection, using the 'name' value of the results. Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.appointment_details`

item.name: Add Appointment Preferred Phone Number to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should collect a valid Phone Number for both video and phone consultations. ### Disclaimer Required > By continuing, you authorize Lyric Health and its authorized representatives to contact you at the above phone number via phone, video, text or voicemail for the purposes of providing treatment, scheduling appointments, discussing my private health information, and conducting evaluations. ### Data collected: - patientPhone - STRING | valid US phone number | 10 digits only, no special characters Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patientPhone`

Your member experience should collect Vitals and other Anthropometric Measurements for this consult. **Height and Weight are required, everything else is optional.** ### Data collected: - heightFeet - INT | "feet" part of member's height - heightInches - INT | "inches" part of member's height - weight - INT | lbs - bloodPressureSystolic - INT | Blood Pressure Systolic reading (OPTIONAL) - bloodPressureDiastolic - INT | Blood Pressure Diastolic reading (OPTIONAL) - temperature - DECIMAL| Body temperature in Fahrenheit (OPTIONAL) - heartRate - INT | Beats Per Minute reading (OPTIONAL) - respiratoryRate - INT | Breaths Per Minute reading (OPTIONAL) - oxygenSaturation - INT | SpO2 Percentage reading (OPTIONAL) - bmi - DECIMAL | Body Mass Index reading (OPTIONAL) Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.personal`

item.name: Review & Add Women's Health to Payload

request.description: ### REQUIRED FOR FEMALE Your member experience should collect Women's Health Questionnaire when the member's gender/sex at birth is female. ### Data collected: - breastfeeding - BOOLEAN | true or false - pregnant - BOOLEAN | true or false - last_menstruation_date - STRING | date format YYYY-MM-DD Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.personal`

Your member experience should review current Medications retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medications** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medications` (Do not remove the userMedication_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medications using the **Medication Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Use 'value' from search result - frequency - STRING | Max 50 Chars | Provided by your member experience - comment - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - isCurrentlyUsing - BOOLEAN | true or false | Provided by your member experience - foreignId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - ndc - STRING | Use 'NDC' from search result - medicationId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - lexiGenDrugID - STRING | Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result - lexiDrugSynId - STRING | Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medications` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medications.push( { name: STRING, // Use 'value' from search result frequency: STRING, // Max 50 Chars - Provided by your member experience comment: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience isCurrentlyUsing: BOOLEAN, // true or false - Provided by your member experience foreignId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result ndc: STRING, // Use 'NDC' from search result medicationId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result lexiGenDrugID: STRING, // Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result lexiDrugSynId: STRING, // Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Medication Allergies to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Medication Allergies retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.allergies** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.allergies` (Do not remove the userMedicationAllergy_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medication Allergies using the **Medication Allergy Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - foreign_id - INT | Use 'medicationAllergyForeignId' from search result - description - STRING | Use 'medicationAllergyName' from search result - damConceptId - INT | Use 'damConceptId' from search result - damConceptIdType - STRING | Use 'damConceptIdType' from search result - codeType - STRING | Use 'codeType' from search result - code - INT | Use 'code' from search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.allergies` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.allergies.push( { foreign_id: INT, // Use 'medicationAllergyForeignId' from search result description: STRING, // Use 'medicationAllergyName' from search result damConceptId: INT, // Use 'damConceptId' from search result damConceptIdType: STRING, // Use 'damConceptIdType' from search result codeType: STRING, // Use 'codeType' from search result code: INT // Use 'code' from search result } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Medical Conditions to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Medical Conditions retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medical_conditions** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions` (Do not remove the userMedicalCondition_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medical Conditions in free text. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Max 200 Chars | Provided by your member experience - description - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - status - INT | 0 or 1 | 1 = Currently Has, 0 = Had in the past Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions.push( { name: STRING, // Max 200 Chars - Provided by your member experience description: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience status: INT, // (0 or 1) | 1 = Currently Has, 0 = Had in the past } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Surgical History to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Surgical History retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.surgical_history** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history` (Do not remove the userSurgicalHistory_id key/value pair) Your member experience may collect any additional Surgical History records in free text. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Max 200 Chars | Provided by your member experience - description - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - procedureDate - STRING | Date format YYYY-MM-DD | Provided by your member experience Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history.push( { name: STRING, - Max 200 Chars - Provided by your member experience description: STRING, - Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience procedureDate: STRING, - Date with format YYYY-MM-DD } ) ```

formdata.description: Accepted Types: gif,jpeg,jpg,pjpeg,png,pdf

request.description:
#### OPTIONAL

Your member experience may collect one or more Attachments(images, documents) that the member would like to share with the physician. 

First the attachments need to be uploaded to the member's EMR using the **Add Attachments** endpoint defined here. The resulting **attachment_id** will be added to the to **Consultation Payload** attachments array.

### Data collected:
 - attachment_id - INT | use 'attachment_id' from Add Attachment result


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.attachments` with the following notation:
    

``` json
payload.patient.ehr.attachments.push( [ 1001, 1002, 1003 ] )

 ```

item.name: Review & Add Health Questionnaire to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review all Health Questionnaires retrieved from **Step 2 - consultation.available_questionnaires** and add filled questionnaires to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.questionnaires` Each question will have a `"require": BOOLEAN` key/value pair that determines whether or not it needs to be collected. ### Data collected: - question_id - INT | use 'question_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[]` - choice - INT | use 'choice_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` - lang_identifier: INT | use 'lang_identifier' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` - value - STRING | Max 5000 Chars| required if the answer/choice selected is "Other" and type is "textarea" Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: \`payload.questionnaires with the following object model: ``` json payload.questionnaires.push( questionnaire_id: INT, answers: [ { question_id: INT, // use 'question_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[]` choice: INT, // use 'choice_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` lang_identifier: INT, // use 'lang_identifier' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` value: STRING, // Max 5000 Chars - required if the answer/choice selected is "Other" and type is "textarea", otherwise this key/value pair is optional } ] ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Preferred Pharmacy to Payload

query.description: Matches all entries that have CVS and 75070 in their name and address
OPTIONAL - Search within 10 mi radius of a zipcode

request.description: Your member experience should review current Preferred Pharmacy retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.patient.pharmacy** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.sureScriptPharmacy_id` Your member experience may collect a different Pharmacy using the **Pharmacy Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - sureScriptPharmacy_id - INT | use 'sureScriptPharmacy_id' from Pharmacy Search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.sureScriptPharmacy_id`

#### REQUIRED IF `Selected Provider Fee` > 0

Your member experience may collect a form of Payment using our Payment Processor's integration. Required if the fee for that selected provider is > 0. See **Add Provider and Appointment Date/Time** step under **Scheduling**. Each provider result has a `fee` key\value pair.

We use **Paypal Braintree** for payment processing. Please see [Braintree Development Docs](https://developer.paypal.com/braintree/docs/start/overview) for your specific implementation. 

### Data collected:
 - fee - DECIMAL | use 'fee' Provider Search results | changing fee will result in error. We require this seemingly redundant parameter for confirmation and compliance.
 - nonce - STRING | Payment nonce resulted from your Braintree integration


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.payment`

## Legal Your member experience should require the member to agree to Lyric Health's: - [Informed Consent](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extInformedConsent) - [Terms of Use](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extTermsOfUse) - [HIPAA Privacy Policy and Practices](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extPrivacyPolicy) **Whitelabel** clients should replace `https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric` with their own URL and SITE CODE provided by Lyric Health (e.g. `https://portal.mywhitelabel.com/sitecode`)

item.description:
Step-by-step implementation example of the Psychiatry workflow:

- Step 1 - Get Eligible Members
- Step 2 - Start Consultation For Member
- Step 3 - Create a **Consultation Payload** object locally and populate it with various appointment details from your member experience: **Reason for Visit, Scheduling details, Medical Records, Pharmacy, Payment**
- Step 4 - Display appropriate consents and agreements
- Step 5 - Submit **Consultation Payload**
    

**Note:** Psychiatry consultations are always video consults

item.name: Review & Add Women's Health to Payload

request.description: ### REQUIRED FOR FEMALE Your member experience should collect Women's Health Questionnaire when the member's gender/sex at birth is female. ### Data collected: - breastfeeding - BOOLEAN | true or false - pregnant - BOOLEAN | true or false - last_menstruation_date - STRING | date format YYYY-MM-DD Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.personal`

Your member experience should review current Medications retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medications** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medications` (Do not remove the userMedication_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medications using the **Medication Search** endpoint defined here. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Use 'value' from search result - frequency - STRING | Max 50 Chars | Provided by your member experience - comment - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - isCurrentlyUsing - BOOLEAN | true or false | Provided by your member experience - foreignId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - ndc - STRING | Use 'NDC' from search result - medicationId - INT | Use 'MedicationID' from search result - lexiGenDrugID - STRING | Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result - lexiDrugSynId - STRING | Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medications` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medications.push( { name: STRING, // Use 'value' from search result frequency: STRING, // Max 50 Chars - Provided by your member experience comment: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience isCurrentlyUsing: BOOLEAN, // true or false - Provided by your member experience foreignId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result ndc: STRING, // Use 'NDC' from search result medicationId: INT, // Use 'MedicationID' from search result lexiGenDrugID: STRING, // Use 'lexiGenDrugID' from search result lexiDrugSynId: STRING, // Use 'lexiDrugSynId' from search result } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Medical Conditions to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Medical Conditions retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.medical_conditions** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions` (Do not remove the userMedicalCondition_id key/value pair) Your member experience should collect any additional Medical Conditions in free text. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Max 200 Chars | Provided by your member experience - description - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - status - INT | 0 or 1 | 1 = Currently Has, 0 = Had in the past Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.medical_conditions.push( { name: STRING, // Max 200 Chars - Provided by your member experience description: STRING, // Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience status: INT, // (0 or 1) | 1 = Currently Has, 0 = Had in the past } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Surgical History to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review current Surgical History retrieved from **Step 2 - ehr.surgical_history** and add final selection to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history` (Do not remove the userSurgicalHistory_id key/value pair) Your member experience may collect any additional Surgical History records in free text. ### Data collected: - name - STRING | Max 200 Chars | Provided by your member experience - description - STRING | Max 500 Chars | Provided by your member experience - procedureDate - STRING | Date format YYYY-MM-DD | Provided by your member experience Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history` with the following object model: ``` json payload.patient.ehr.surgical_history.push( { name: STRING, - Max 200 Chars - Provided by your member experience description: STRING, - Max 500 Chars - Provided by your member experience procedureDate: STRING, - Date with format YYYY-MM-DD } ) ```

item.name: Review & Add Health Questionnaire to Payload

request.description: Your member experience should review all Health Questionnaires retrieved from **Step 2 - consultation.available_questionnaires** and add filled questionnaires to **Consultation Payload** under `payload.questionnaires` Each question will have a `"require": BOOLEAN` key/value pair that determines whether or not it needs to be collected. ### Data collected: - question_id - INT | use 'question_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[]` - choice - INT | use 'choice_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` - lang_identifier: INT | use 'lang_identifier' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` - value - STRING | Max 5000 Chars| required if the answer/choice selected is "Other" and type is "textarea" Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: \`payload.questionnaires with the following object model: ``` json payload.questionnaires.push( questionnaire_id: INT, answers: [ { question_id: INT, // use 'question_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[]` choice: INT, // use 'choice_id' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` lang_identifier: INT, // use 'lang_identifier' from `consultation.available_questionnaires[].questions[].choices[]` value: STRING, // Max 5000 Chars - required if the answer/choice selected is "Other" and type is "textarea", otherwise this key/value pair is optional } ] ) ```

#### REQUIRED IF `Selected Provider Fee` > 0

Your member experience may collect a form of Payment using our Payment Processor's integration. Required if the fee for that selected provider is > 0. See **Add Provider and Appointment Date/Time** step under **Scheduling**. Each provider result has a `fee` key\value pair.

We use **Paypal Braintree** for payment processing. Please see [Braintree Development Docs](https://developer.paypal.com/braintree/docs/start/overview) for your specific implementation. 

### Data collected:
 - fee - DECIMAL | use 'fee' Provider Search results | changing fee will result in error. We require this seemingly redundant parameter for confirmation and compliance.
 - nonce - STRING | Payment nonce resulted from your Braintree integration


Add **Data Collected** to **Consultation Payload** under: `payload.payment`

## Legal Your member experience should require the member to agree to Lyric Health's: - [Informed Consent](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extInformedConsent) - [Terms of Use](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extTermsOfUse) - [HIPAA Privacy Policy and Practices](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/legal/extPrivacyPolicy) **Whitelabel** clients should replace `https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric` with their own URL and SITE CODE provided by Lyric Health (e.g. `https://portal.mywhitelabel.com/sitecode`)

It is important for the member to know what to expect. A message similar to this should be shown:

> The dermatologist will review your consultation details, health records and attached images within 72 hours and provide a treatment plan with prescriptions(if applicable). 
  
> In some cases, the provider may need to contact you via phone or video for additional information, or to perform a video consultation.

item.description:
Step-by-step implementation example of the Dermatology workflow:

- Step 1 - Get Eligible Members
- Step 2 - Start Consultation For Member
- Step 3 - Create a **Consultation Payload** object locally and populate it with various appointment details from your member experience: **Reason for Visit, Scheduling details, Medical Records, Payment, Attachments, Questionnaires**
- Step 4 - Display appropriate consents and agreements
- Step 5 - Submit **Consultation Payload**
    

**Dermarology is different than the other specialty consults in that there are five states that require it be done via video consult. All other states are done as an async visit.**

**The five states are: AZ,AR,IA,ID,IN.**

**When selecting the state you should either allow the member to choose a provider/date/time for the video consult if they chose one of the five states OR choose only a provider if they didn't.**

request.description:
Stream a pdf document or image attachment with their respective mime type.

**Stream Methods**: thumb, inline, attachment

**thumb** \- returns a thumbnail of that attachment

**inline** \- returns attachment data and mime type with the Content-Disposition as 'inline'

**attachment** \- similar to inline except the Content-Disposition is set to 'attachment' which triggers a browser download.

item.description:
All endpoints in this section require that the authenticated user is a member.

### In this section members can:

- Create and manage consultations
- Manage their EHR
- Manage their account information
- Manage their pets (if they have this benefit)
- etc.

item.description:
## Logging in with a single-use Browser Access Token

Below are details on how to use the Browser Access Token to land the member on a specific area of the platform.

You must get the access token from one of the SSO - Create Access Token... endpoints.

**Redirect the member to the following URL:**

**STAGING:** [https://staging.getlyric.com/lyric/login/sso/{ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE}?redirectId=1](https://staging.getlyric.com/lyric/login/sso/%7BACCESS_TOKEN_HERE%7D?redirectId=1)

**PROD:** [https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/login/sso/{ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE}?redirectId=1](https://portal.getlyric.com/lyric/login/sso/%7BACCESS_TOKEN_HERE%7D?redirectId=1)

RedirectId is optional. If you do not pass it, the member will land on their portal dashboard.  
If you do pass a redirectId, the member will be redirected into the portal based on the passed redirectId:

• '1': Directed to the notification settings screen  
• '4': Directed to the Diagnostic By Phone consultation  
• '5': Directed to the Diagnostic By Video consultation  
• '6': Directed to the Informational By Phone consultation  
• '7': Directed to the Ask A Doctor  
• '8': Directed to their medical records  
• '9': Directed to VPC Phone Consult Start  
• '10': Directed to VPC Video Consult Start  
• '11': Directed to their consultation history  
• '12': Directed to Pet Consult Start  
• '13': Directed to Message A Specialist

All endpoints in this section require that the authenticated user is an SSO Admin.

### **In this section SSO Admins can:**

- Create Browser Access Tokens which allow the member to SSO into our platform without logging in.
    
- Create API Access Tokens which creates a token for API Access as the member.

item.description:
All endpoints in this section require that the authenticated user is an Group/Census Admin.

### **In this section** Group/Census Admin**s can:**

- Add primary and dependent members
- Edit primary and dependent members
